mapper.select: select * from admin where name = #{name} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into ssmbuild.user(username,password, gender, age, studentNum, phoneNum, money, college, grade) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{studentNum}, #{phoneNum}, #{money}, #{college}, #{grade})
mapper.select: select * from ssmbuild.user where username like #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into ssmbuild.books(bookName, bookCounts, detail, date, author, type, money, count) values (#{bookName}, #{bookCounts}, #{detail}, #{date}, #{author}, #{type}, #{money}, #{count})
mapper.select: select * from ssmbuild.books where bookName like #{bookName}
